news.text:
The Recommendations Update is out!

Added a Recommendations system based on the GDDP Website.
Get the update on GitHub or the Geode Index!

The XP Update is out!

Added a Skill XP system based on the GDDP Website.
Get the update on GitHub or the Geode Index!

The mod now has a news system!

This will be used for any list changes, new packs, or general
announcements for the mod!
